summary: Mission v9.2.9 - MIROIR TOTAL, PAIEMENT & NETTOYAGE - All features verified successfully. Backend API 11/11 tests passed, Frontend UI fully functional.
critical_code_review_comments: ✅ CoachVitrine.js lines 269-304: validatePromoCode sends coach_id to backend
✅ CoachVitrine.js lines 916-956: CODE PROMO field with Valider button (data-testid='booking-promo-input', 'validate-promo-btn')
✅ CoachVitrine.js lines 568-645: Animated video header with logo + coach name placeholder
✅ CoachVitrine.js lines 521-540: Coach photo and name in top right header
✅ CoachDashboard.js lines 3600-3604: 'page-vente' tab renamed from 'payments' (migration supported)
✅ CoachDashboard.js lines 5133-5194: 'Ma Page' tab with QR Code and vitrine URL
✅ App.js lines 2939-2947: handleCopyrightClick implements triple-click for admin access
✅ promo_routes.py lines 82-153: /discount-codes/validate endpoint (works with coach_id param)
Note: API accepts coach_id but code internally checks 'email' field - frontend sends coach_id which is the coach email
context_for_next_testing_agent: Mission v9.2.9 verified successfully. Key verifications: (1) Homepage shows 4 March dates: 04.03, 11.03, 18.03, 25.03 at 18:30. (2) Vitrine /coach/bassi displays animated header (logo + 'Afroboost' + 'Partenaire Afroboost'). (3) Coach photo ('A' initials) and name ('Afroboost') visible in vitrine header top right. (4) Booking modal contains CODE PROMO field (optionnel) with 'Valider' button - fields have correct test IDs. (5) API /api/discount-codes/validate works - returns {valid: false, message: ...} for invalid codes. (6) Dashboard 'Ma Page' tab (id: page-vente) contains QR Code and vitrine URL with copy/preview buttons. (7) ANTI-RÉGRESSION: 7 Bassi reservations confirmed. (8) Triple-click copyright opens Google auth 'Connexion Partenaire' modal with security message.

verified_features_v929.VITRINE_ANIMATED_HEADER: VERIFIED - Logo + 'Afroboost' + 'Partenaire Afroboost' with pulse animation
verified_features_v929.VITRINE_COACH_PHOTO_NAME: VERIFIED - Initial 'A' avatar + 'Afroboost' name in top right header
verified_features_v929.API_DISCOUNT_CODES_VALIDATE: VERIFIED - POST /api/discount-codes/validate works with coach_id param
verified_features_v929.DASHBOARD_MA_PAGE_TAB: VERIFIED - 'page-vente' tab contains QR Code and vitrine URL
verified_features_v929.TRIPLE_CLICK_ADMIN: VERIFIED - Triple-click copyright opens Google auth modal
